alert.note: Alert for Cobb; Douglas (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 27 at 3:20AM EST until January 27 at 4:36PM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Georgia... Sweetwater Creek near Austell affecting Douglas and Cobb Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Sweetwater Creek near Austell. * WHEN...Until late this afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 12 feet, Minor flooding continues in the woodlands and fields upstream and downstream from the gage near the Interstate 20 bridge. Portions of a paintball playing field just downstream of the bridge and athletic fields in the Woodrow Wilson Park on Mount Vernon Road are flooded with one to two feet of water. A portion of Wren Circle in Douglas County, the County Iron Works and Sunlight Drive in Cobb County begin to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:00 AM EST Saturday the stage was 11.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late this morning and continue falling to 3.2 feet Wednesday evening. - Flood stage is 10 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta. The next statement will be issued this afternoon at 330 PM EST.
